sentences.en: All apples on apple trees are downward.
sentences.cn: 苹果树上的所有苹果都是向下的.

sentences.en: Benedict pointed downward again with his stick.
sentences.cn: 贝内迪克特又用他的拐杖向下指了指。

sentences.en: Downward movement is much faster than upward one.
sentences.cn: 向下移动比向上移动快得多.

sentences.en: Each firm will face a downward-sloping demand curve.
sentences.cn: 每一家企业都将面临需求曲线的下滑。

sentences.en: Ever coursing downward and ever renewed from above?
sentences.cn: 总是从上游流来又向下游流去 么 ?

sentences.en: He is on the downward path.
My career seemed to be on a downward trajectory.
sentences.cn: 我的事业似乎在走下坡路。

sentences.en: Share prices continued their downward trend.
sentences.cn: 股票价格继续保持着下行趋势。

sentences.en: the downward slope of a hill
The downward trend in home ownership is likely to continue.
sentences.cn: 拥有房屋所有权者人数减少的趋势可能会持续。

sentences.en: The downward trend went into reverse and the scores started to creep up again.
sentences.cn: 比分下降的趋势发生逆转，分数又开始逐渐上升了。

sentences.en: The garden sloped gently downward to the river.
sentences.cn: 花园呈缓坡向河边倾斜.

sentences.en: The rise, the first in 10 months, reversed the downward trend in Belgium's jobless rate.
sentences.cn: 10个月来失业率的首次上升逆转了比利时失业率持续下降的趋势。

sentences.en: The road downward has but few landings and level places.
sentences.cn: 下坡路上很少有落脚点和气地.

sentences.en: This marked a 7% increase on the previous year and the reversal of a steady five-year downward trend.
sentences.cn: 这标志着在前一年基础上有了7％的增长，扭转了5年来持续下降的趋势。

words.tran_cn: 软毛，绒毛；[地质] 开阔的高地
下降趋势；向下摆动；衰落

phrases.tran_cn: 向下旋转；螺旋式下跌；减记恶性循环

trans.tran_en: moving or pointing towards a lower position
If you move or look downward, you move or look toward the ground or a lower level
